thread.title: Michael Dell berates Microsofts Nadella about high price of Surface tablet
thread.title_full: Michael Dell berates Microsofts Nadella about high price of Surface tablet

title: Michael Dell berates Microsofts Nadella about high price of Surface tablet
text:
Michael Dell berates Microsoft's Nadella about high price of Surface tablet 
The Inquirer Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
has taken a sly dig at Microsoft, saying to CEO Satya Nadella that the prices of its hardware, such as the Surface, are "pretty high". 
Speaking on stage during an interview with Nadella...
